caseTitle: Mian Umar Ikram-ul-Haque v. Dr.Shahida Hasnain,etc
tagline: When the relationship of landlord and tenant is denied, the Rent Tribunal would lack jurisdiction, on account of the doctrine of jurisdictional fact, to pass an order for payment of rent due under Section 24 of the Punjab Rented Premises Act, 2009 until and unless the Tribunal positively ascertains the relationship of tenancy and establishes that the respondent to the eviction application is in fact a ‘tenant’ in terms of Section 2(l) of the Act.
